POSITIVE REMINDER TO KEEP MENTAL HEALTH – The desk decor will remind you to focus on what you can control, stop worrying about things you can’t control，You’ll be much more effective when you put your time and energy into the things you can control.
NICE GIFT IDEA – Perfect office decor for any psychologist, counselor, social worker, teacher, or therapist! A unique and creative birthday, graduation, or motivational gifts for women，adults，kids，friend, parents, boyfriend, girlfriend, coworker, etc. It also can fully express your appreciation and enthusiasm to them, what’s more, when they look at the decor, they will remember you.
EASY TO USE – Diameter – 5.5 inch. Thickness – 0.2 inch. Please make sure you pick the right size. Every decor with a ABS desk stand，easy to install，so you can enjoy your desk art immediately. Decor board made from high-quality basswood，to make sure you can use it for years and years, also wooden decors have no bad smelling. HD printing , friendly environment ink jet.
FIND YOUR PEACE OF MIND AGAIN- Learning to recognize what you can and can’t control is a good first step that can help you develop the ability to cope. Learning to accept and cope with things you can’t control might help you find peace of mind when faced with difficult situations. It could also help you relieve stress and anxiety.
LIFETIME SATISFACTION GUARANTEE – 7 * 24h Free-hassle refund or replacement service. By using a renewable material like wood fiber, we avoid using fossil or finite materials. We want to have a positive impact on the planet. Look for all of Kathytree for inspirational, fun, sarcastic, and heart-warming gifts and home decor.

For over two decades Snuggle Puppy has successfully reduced stress and anxiety for over ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $35.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 03:06:53 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Snuggle Puppy

Reducing stress and anxiety for over 1,000,000 pets

We design our products to speak to your pet’s natural instincts in ways that alleviate anxiety, promote play and provide comfort and calm.

For over two decades Snuggle Puppy has successfully reduced stress and anxiety for over 1,000,000 pets.

How did we get our start?

Our Michigan based company began in 1997. Ever since we’ve been helping pets and pet parents with problems such as separation anxiety, traveling, crate training, and more.

What makes our products unique?

We design our products to speak to your pet’s natural instincts in ways that alleviate anxiety, promote play and provide comfort. Snuggle Puppy has become a much-needed friend for over 1 million pets.

Why do we love what we do?

We’ve helped hundreds of shelters and organizations bring comfort to the animals waiting to be adopted through our Snuggle Puppy Cares program.

Click to View Products

Original Snuggle Puppy

Since 1997 Snuggle Puppy has helped over 1,000,000 dogs by reducing barking, whining and anxiety

Snuggle Puppy Starter Kits

Contains an Original Snuggle Puppy, 3 Heat Packs, Snuggle Puppy Blanket, Puppy’s 1st Toy, and Puppy Teething Aid

Click to View Products

Tender-Tuffs

Tough plush dog toys made with TearBlok technology to extend playtime

Bounderz

Designed for durable, lasting interactive fun and engagement with an unpredictable bounce

Snuggle Puppy Grooming Tools

High quality grooming tools featuring non-slip handles and stainless steel

Snuggle Nuggets Treats

High Protein Freeze-Dried Dog Training Treats That Your Pup Will Love

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 12 x 6 x 3 inches; 12 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ SP112
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 2 AAA batteries required. (included)
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 10, 2017
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ SNUGO – pallet ordering
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0722XGRMB

REDUCE NEGATIVE BEHAVIORS – Get more sleep! Helps with crate & kennel training by reducing barking, whining and anxiety for your dog, helping YOU sleep at night
EASY TO USE – Industry leading “Real-Feel” heartbeat with 2 modes; AAA batteries and simple to use Heat Pack included
CERTIFIED SAFE MATERIALS – Every Snuggle Puppy made from materials certified safe for human use; machine washable and easy to clean
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – US based, our customer service is second to none. We promise our Snuggle Puppy will help your family: we stand behind that promise 100%

Ease Loneliness, Fear, and Separation Anxiety

The Snuggle Puppy recreates maternal intimacy with physical warmth and an advanced “Real-Feel” pulsing heartbeat with 2 modes (8-hour setting / 24-hour setting)

Meet The Original Snuggle Puppy: Your Dog’s New Best Friend For Life


The Original Comforting Heartbeat Toy for Dogs

Don’t Be Fooled…

Over 1 million dogs cuddled and comforted by the Original Snuggle Puppy and counting! Give your pet a reliable product that is tried-and-true for over twenty years. Give your pet the best with the Original Snuggle Puppy.

Certified Safe Materials

Each Snuggle Puppy is made from materials certified safe for human use; machine washable and easy to clean with the heart removed. Certified by STU Testing Service in June 2022.

Real-Feel Pulsing Heartbeat

Advanced “Real-Feel” dual mode pulsing heartbeat; our proprietary heart can be set to beat for 8 hours, or for 24-hour continuous use. With an easy access pouch to turn on/off heartbeat and insert a Snuggle Puppy heat pack inside of product (additional Snuggle Puppy heat packs available).

Pet Calming Solution

Comfort For Any Dog

The Original Snuggle Puppy is designed to provide comfort and helps relieve anxiety in your four-legged friend. Whatever the case; whether in the playpen, crate training, a new transition, traveling, fireworks, or perhaps a thunderstorm, rest assured the Original Snuggle Puppy is there to help.

All Natural, Without Medication or Restraint

Dogs and puppies are pack animals who are instinctively drawn to their mother and others in their pack. The Original Snuggle Puppy recreates that intimacy with physical warmth and a “real-feel” pulsing heartbeat, providing an extra source of comfort for your pet.

Over 1 Million Dogs Comforted Since 1997

Our US based customer response team is second to none and here to help. We promise our Snuggle Puppy will help your family, and we stand behind that promise 100%.

item.title: Best Friends by Sheri The Original Calming Donut Cat and Dog Bed in Shag and Lux Fur, Machine Washable, High Bolster, Multiple Sizes S-XXL
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Give your pet more than just a dog bed! Best Friend’s by Sheri is the original creator of the most popular dog bed that has surfaced the internet in recent years: The Calming Donut Dog Bed. This innovative cuddler shag design provides better sleep, supports joints, and offers a calming, ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $34.99 - $24.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 03:48:54 UTC – Details)


Give your pet more than just a dog bed! Best Friend’s by Sheri is the original creator of the most popular dog bed that has surfaced the internet in recent years: The Calming Donut Dog Bed. This innovative cuddler shag design provides better sleep, supports joints, and offers a calming, self-warming effect. The donut cuddler is carefully crafted with durable, vegan nylon and filled with CoziLOFT fibers, allowing your pet to be instantly enveloped in premium, soft, luxurious comfort. The poly filling in our calming dog bed keeps its loft for up to 3Xs longer than standard pet beds, meaning it provides longer comfort, support and aesthetic appeal. Encouraging a deeper night’s rest or a refreshing daytime nap, our soothing dog bed is special because it’s been carefully designed to provide optimal neck, joint, and muscle support. For dogs and cats who like to burrow, the bed creates a perfect space for cuddles and top-notch snuggling. With a water and dirt-resistant bottom, our calming pet bed helps prevent messes from reaching your floors. When accidents happen, toss the shell or bed (small 23″x23″) into the washing machine for easy clean up. Follow the instructions on the label to ensure proper care.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 17.91 x 13.39 x 10.43 inches; 2.18 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 4598
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ February 2, 2017
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Sentiments, Inc.
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B01MV0IX66
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China
Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S. International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More

SUPERIOR COMFORT: Cozy, flexible, and finished with vegan faux shag fur, our warming luxury dog bed is reminiscent of a mother’s fur coat. Paired with deep crevices that allow your pet to burrow, animals will have full, restful sleep for improved behavior and better health. The uniquely designed CoziLOFT fibers keep their loft for up to 3Xs longer than standard pet beds.
VERSATILE DESIGN and MAINTENANCE: Available in beautifully natural colors, our cat and dog donut beds are a seamless addition to any room’s décor. Finished with water and dirt-resistant bottoms, accidental messes will be prevented from reaching your floors. Removable shells available on size M-2XL beds are machine washable. The entirety of the small-sized bed is machine washable. (Do not leave bed to air dry, as this may lead to tangling and matting of the faux fur).
PET-SAFE MATERIALS: Tested through Consumer Product Safety Commission certified labs to ensure safety for you and your pets. Free from: flame retardants, formaldehyde, skin irritating chemicals, harsh dyes.
SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Designed and shipped from Los Angeles, CA, our local customer service is only a phone call or email away to address any concerns and questions to ensure you and your pets are happy with your purchase.

Read more

Best Friends by Sheri Calming Dog Beds & Cat Beds

Quality fill

Our calming dog beds are filled with premium quality fibers that provide added support and keep their loft for up to 3x longer than most other fiber-filled pet beds.

Pet-safe materials

Our calming dog beds are made with responsibly-sourced materials and fillings free from mercury, lead, heavy metals, formaldehyde, and cancer-causing flame retardents.

Soft to the touch

We use high quality, pet-safe, vegan faux fur that is not only long lasting and home-friendly, but ultra plush to provide comfort for your fur baby.

Easy to clean

Small size dog and cat beds are safe to machine wash and dry whole. Sizes medium – extra large come with machine washable zipper covers. Remove cover to wash.

Read more

  • Designed and shipped from the U.S.
  • Water and dirt-resistant base
  • Maintains thickness up to 3x longer
  • Double overlock-stitch provides a stronger, reinforced edge finish that gives durability through wear and wash.

Dog Bed & Cat Bed Care Instructions

Washing your pet bed

Entire bed is safe to machine wash and dry (small size). Removeable zipper shell is safe to machine wash and dry (medium, large, x-large sizes). Simply wash with cold water on the gentle cycle using non-toxic laundry detergent. Wash separately from other laundry items.

Drying your ped bed

Tumble dry low. To prevent shag fabric beds from matting, dry the bed thoroughly. Do not air dry.

Read more

About Best Friends by Sheri

Best Friends by Sheri is home of the Original Calming Donut Cuddler pet bed. Our calming dog beds, cat beds, faux fur donut beds, and pet huts are designed to mimic the anxiety-easing security of a mother’s fur coat. Part of the Outward Hound pack of brands, we’re a team of passionate pet parents who understand your pets are part of the family. We’re committed to developing products that inspire tails to wag, put smiles on faces, and make every adventure with your pet better. We spend our days listening to other pet parents and playing with our own pets so we can make the best toys, treats, and gear for yours. We’ve got your cat or dog covered with our award-winning brands, including Outward Hound, Best Friends by Sheri, Planet Dog, Petstages, Charming Pet, Wholesome Pride Pet Treats, and Nina Ottosson treat puzzle toys.

Read more
